pullRequest.title: SAK-44626 Lessons Add Dates to Assignment Links
pullRequest.bodyText: SAK-44626 Lessons Add Dates to Assignment Links

nodes.bodyText: Can this be initialized where it's declared? Otherwise it has to be initialized every time this method is called.
You don't need to call .replace() twice, just use the messageLocator.getMessage() method that takes an array of substitution values to replace, like it was doing before you moved the code.
